successes.description: To bring 3D printing technology into everyone's home by building a quality and affordable 3D printer that everyone can enjoy!

Pledges.description: Get an Official Pirate3D bumper sticker! Yarr!
Get the Official Pirate3D limited edition compressed T-Shirt mailed to you!

Batch 2 of The Buccaneer: Early Parrot Special - GET 1 Unit of The BUCCANEER + 1 Cartridge of Print Material. ($247 + $50 shipping for USA/Canada/Singapore, International customers, please read section on shipping.)

Batch 1: Professional Pirate Batch - These are the pre-production units, be the cool kid on the block and get The Buccaneer before anyone else. There may be some bugs to work out so we suggest that you get this reward ONLY IF you have experience with 3D printers.**  GET 1 Unit of The BUCCANEER + 1 Cartridge of Print Material.
($347 + $50 shipping for USA/Canada/Singapore, International customers, please read section on shipping.)

Batch 2 of The Buccaneer Feb 2014 - GET 1 Unit of The BUCCANEER + 1 Cartridge of Print Material. ($347 + $50 shipping for USA/Canada/Singapore, International customers, please read section on shipping.)

Batch 3 of The Buccaneer April 2014 (5 extra cartridges) - Same as $397 Batch 3 April 2014 + 5 Extra Cartridges of Print Material. ($397 + $50 shipping for USA/Canada/Singapore, International customers, please read section on shipping.)

Batch 3 of The Buccaneer April 2014 (10 extra cartridges) - Same as $397 Batch 3 April 2014  + 10 Extra Cartridges of Print Material. ($447 + $50 shipping for USA/Canada/Singapore, International customers, please read section on shipping.)

Kraken Developers' Pack - GET 1 Unit of The BUCCANEER (In Dec 2013) with your name, laser engraved on it + 10 Cartridges of Print Material + Exclusive access to private developers' support forum + Be in the know for all future Pirate3D developments. Shipping included in price.
